description:
Caramia, Kyrie, and Axel are preparing for the attack by the Grimm Academy, but somehow, Scarlet is involved as well. 
Kyrie hands Scarlet a sniper rifle and tells him to participate in the battle. 
As Scarlet tells Kyrie he’s never even seen a gun before, the students of the Grimm Academy, Hansel and Gretel appears...
Source: crunchyroll
